title: Remove phone number, address, and map from Contact page

requirements.text: Remove the phone number display from the Contact/Location page

quotes: On contact remove the phone number address and map

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is no longer visible on the Contact page
No phone-related UI elements remain in the contact information section

requirements.text: Remove the address display from the Contact/Location page

quotes: On contact remove the phone number address and map

acceptanceCriteria: Venue address is no longer displayed on the Contact page
Location-related text content is removed from the contact information

requirements.text: Remove the map display from the Contact/Location page

quotes: On contact remove the phone number address and map

acceptanceCriteria: Map placeholder or embedded map is no longer visible on the Contact page
No map-related UI elements remain in the layout

constraints: Maintain the existing cartoon/neon styling for remaining Contact page elements
Preserve the email contact information if present
nonGoals: Adding new contact methods or information
Redesigning the overall Contact page layout beyond removing specified elements
